member.name: T:GrapeCity.ActiveReports.Core.Document.Drawing.Gc.GcImageConverterService
member.summary: Service for converting image data to another format through GcDoc.

members.member:
Converts image to one of allowed image format if needed.
A stream that contains the image data. Allowed image formats. The conversion will not be performed if the image have one of these formats. The conversion will be performed to the first of these format If image format is not allowed. Specifies whether to rotate the image according to the EXIF orientation. The ImageData struct which contains the data stream from which the image can be loaded and the format of the image.
